name: Gen Wealth
description: Lets show the world that we degens can have fun build a community and create GEN WEALTH! MEMECOINS are the new MEMESTONKS! What is GEN WEALTH? Generational wealth is the concept of traders making such monumental gains during a pump, that their grand-children will be able to live irresponsible and lavish lives without a care in the world. Generational wealth is the concept of traders making such monumental gains during a pump, that their grand-children will be able to live irresponsible and lavish lives without a care in the world. We all know the r/wallstreetbets subreddit community, greatest bunch of degenerate traders the world had ever seen… Last time they came together, they pumped dying retail companies into BILLIONS in valuation, royally screwed hedge funds and big institutions in favor of the people and, well… Now they’re here to do it again! This time though, not memestocks, but meme COINS!
